items.title: Linux Basics and Creating a Server
items.headline: Installing Linux, Learning How to Use it, and Creating a Server
objectives_summary: Students will not only be able to create servers, but they will understand how the basic operating system and tools they're using work. This means that students will have the tools to be self-sufficient and expand on their knowledge easily. They will be able to understand error messages, solve problems on their own, and address hardware-specific issues.
